This game is fun for me. Everything in perspective is balanced if you play how it was intended to play, meaning you don't pallet loop as a survivor, survivors play stealthy and actually hide from killer etc.  There is always going to be people that get upset when you don't play the game how they want people to play.

it's finding a balance between having fun and knowing how a match might go that is key.  Survivors don't always survive and there will always be people that don't understand that.

this game is amazing if you like survival games. it is not a bad as it sounds  it is co-op  and you can play with friends. also it is a game you learn by playing so don't expect to be great when you start . the visuals have been completely overhauled recently making everything look much nicer.

C'est juste un pur bonheur d'y jouer avec des parties courtes et intenses.

I would recommend this game. Great for playing online with friends. Have a lot of hours on it. 
Alternate between survivor and killer to not get rid of the fun.

If your planning on playing this game as the killer role then don't bother with this game, the Dev's have displayed blatant favoritism towards the player base that only mains the survivor role, along with major disassociation to how the game can actually handled or be played as shown in a gameplay video by youtube user Monto.
Until BHVR decide's to properly balance the game in favor of both parties then I will no longer be playing this game as it was meant to be played, I will no longer continue to fund them through in-game purchases, and I will convince all of my friends to come play Last Year: The Nightmare instead of Dead By Daylight.

If you plan on playing a killer in this game, move else where. This game is filled with toxic players and obnoxious gameplay that is frustrating for killers to deal with. Even the developers acknowledged this and their answer was to go play survivor or another game. They have no desire to make this game enjoyable to anyone other than the survivors.

I definitely do not recommend this game. All they do is nerf the killer and buff the survivors, then release a new OP killer to get everyone's money, then nerf them into the ground. There are only about 5 killers even worth playing anymore. The biggest downfall though is the matchmaking. I don't know how many times I see rank 1 survivors pitted against incredibly low lvl killers. So, until they fix this, I can't recommend this game. And since it's always been like that, I probably will never be able to recommend this game. However, if you just want to play a survivor and win 90% of the time, then definitely get this game.

nice game to play with friends

Though I always encounter bugs, it's overall a nice game. One thing though, I happen to always meet killers that tunnel and facecamp me for no obvious reason... I'm not even the obsession, and neither does he have Remember Me or Dying Light. Does a lucky 360/twist count for the reason to camp/patrol? I don't really see any point for the killer to stay around the hooks with people on them unless the killer knows the survivors are coming for the save *cough MM scratched cough*, survivors bring purple flashlight(s)(though not a really good reason.), and/or the killer has perks that need somebody to die. And you don't really need to camp to get a 4k. Don't waste your time, killers. And, for me, it doesn't really matter whether you rank up or down. Or does it?
